bike.description: Specialized A1 Premium Aluminum, fully butted, formed TT, Double ORE DT, externally relieved HT, reinforced disc mount, forged dropouts w/ replaceable hanger, disc only

components.description: SR Suntour SF8-XCT-V2, 80mm, 1pc. alloy lower, 28mm Hi-Ten stanchions, coil/mcu spring w/ preload adj., size-specific spring rates, spring assisted seals
Hi-Ten riserbar, 32mm rise, 640mm wide, 8 degree back sweep, 6 degree up sweep
Specialized Enduro, dual compound Kraton, no flange, 131mm
